Package org.oa4mp.delegation.server.server.config

Class LDAPConfigurationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oa4mp.delegation.server.server.claims.ClaimSourceConfigurationUtil
      • org.oa4mp.delegation.server.server.config.LDAPConfigurationUtil
  • public class LDAPConfigurationUtil
extends ClaimSourceConfigurationUtil
    A utility that loads the configuration from a node and has the tags, etc. for it.

    Created by Jeff Gaynor
    on 5/4/16 at 8:50 AM
